description: “You could walk a mile in these.”

html:
Ankle Strap Pumps

Valentino Garavani Patent Leather Platform Sandals

Never scour your closet for a party shoe again. These patent leather platform sandals go with everything, from dark wash denim to your bridesmaid dress. Plus, it has an ankle strap to ensure it stays on all night long.

Sizes: 36-42

Colors: Black

Platform height: 2.2 inches

The Cozy Boot

UGG Classic Mini Platform Boot

Who would have thought that Bella Hadid eating pizza in her underwear would be such an advertisement for these chunky booties?

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: 7 options

Platform height: 2 inches

Customer review: “I love everything about them! Stylish comfort! The sizing is perfect! I would highly recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Menswear-Inspired Mary Jane

Bottega Veneta Lug Mary-Jane

Everything that glitters is gold, especially if said gold is in the form of a statement buckle. These are technically platforms, but hey—they’re 2.25 inches off the ground, so we think they still count as platforms.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Black

Platform height: 2.25 inches

The Loafer

Prada Platform Loafers

Nothing feels quite as easy as a classic loafer. We think this pair feels like a funkier upgrade of the traditional menswear-inspired shoe.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Black

Platform height: 2.25 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Platform Sneaker

New Balance 574+ Sneakers

New Balance is the move anytime we need to be on our toes all day, whether we’re walking around in a new city or just want to elevate a pair of denim. These have added height and feel like a trendy take on regular sneakers.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Grey on Grey

Platform height: Approx. 2 inches

The Chunky Oxford

Prada Monolith Brushed Leather Lace-Up Shoes

These are on my forever wishlist. We have a few friends who religiously wear these to work and can’t say enough good things about them.

Sizes: 34-42

Colors: Black

Platform height: Approx. 2 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Platform Pump

Christian Louboutin Loo Patent Red Sole Platform Pumps

While the iconic Louboutin “So Kate” pumps might not be the comfiest shoe on the market, these Loo patent pumps are the total opposite. The 2-inch platform will keep you comfy no matter how long you stay on the dance floor.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: Silver, Black, Gold, Mint Green

Platform height: 1.5 inches

The White Trainer

Sans Matin The Ludo

Platform white sneakers might be one of my desert island items. They go with absolutely everything, and like a good pair of black boots, they are one shoe style we can’t live without.

Sizes: 36-42

Colors: White

Platform height: N/A

Customer review: “What a fabulous shoe. These shoes are a fantastic style, high fashion, and high comfort...Great with so many outfits, and even on the first day of wearing them, I was asked four times where I bought them.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Clog

The Drop Francine Clog

Come September, you’ll find these in my heavy rotation.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: Cognac, Light Sand, Black

Platform height: 3.35 inches

The Stacked Sneaker

Adidas Gazelle Bold Shoes

Adidas Sambas have been everywhere, but don’t neglect the brand’s other hero style: the Gazelle. We can’t get over this flatform version.

Sizes: 4.5-11

Colors: 14 colors

Platform height: N/A

Customer review: “A dream come true! No problems with these. I’m on my feet most of the day, and my feet don’t hurt at the end of the day with these shoes.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Combat Boot

Dr. Martens Jadon Platform Boot

One of our editors quite literally wrote a love letter to these boots. She wears them on repeat throughout the colder months. And honestly, we get it..

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Black, White, Red

Platform height: 2 inches

Customer review: “I love the look and the side zipper makes it so easy to get on and off. I wear them all the time!”

The Mary Jane

Melissa Farah

We have a lot of personal respect for the sustainable brand Melissa, and one of my fellow editors regularly wears these sweet Mary Janes to work. We admire them every time.

Sizes: 5-10

Colors: Black, Pink, Brown, Blue, Orange

Platform height: 1.5 inches

    ELLE editor review: “These Mary Janes have become a go-to for me. They’re light, comfy, and easy to walk in, so they’re a great commuter-friendly choice that also looks cute in the office. I like to pair them with a skirt or jeans—with or without socks! I know ballet flats are all the rage right now, but I have a soft spot for these platforms.”—Erica Gonzales, senior culture editor

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    The Party Heel

    Larroudé Dolly Sandal

    Before it became a total It brand, Larroudé was the fashion set’s best kept secret.

    Sizes: 5-13

    Colors: Silver, Black, Gold, Mint Green

    Platform height: 1.5 inches

      Customer review: “So cute yet so comfy, I’m obsessed with these shoes. I wore them all night long dancing at a wedding and couldn’t believe I could just keep going.”

      The Supportive Slide

      Papillio by Birkenstock Arizona Platform Sandal

      You thought Birkenstock already had a hold on you? Just wait until you try on these bad boys.

      Sizes: 5-11.5

      Colors: Mocha, Black, Stone Coin, White

      Platform height: 1.25 inches
